name: K-3PO (Kay-Threepio)
Lore: 'Old-model protocol droid. Learned military tactics while under the ownership of Commander Narra. In charge of the droid pool at Echo Base. May initiate battle and be battled.',
Text: 'May initiate battle and be battled. K-3PO is power +1 for each of your other droids at same Hoth or Yavin 4 site. Functions as a leader if present with another of your droids.',
